attributes.PHYS: Physical prowess, stamina, strength, and overall fitness- Each point in Physique increases your carrying capacity - Every point in Physique increases your movement speed by 5ft - Soldiers and brawlers typically have high PHYS
attributes.REF: Quickness of mind and body sometimes bordering on instinct- Reflex is rolled to determine initiative order in combat - Pilots, Martial Artists, and Spiderman are all known for high REF
attributes.SOC: Empathy, charm, quickness of wit, gravitas, personal magnetism, and picking up on social cues- Diplomats and empaths typically have high SOC
attributes.MENT: Acuity, keenness of mind, learning ability, and mental toughness- Scientists, mechanics, and hackers are likely to want high MENT

skills.Melee (weapons): Proficiency with melee weapons (bar stools, katanas)
skills.Power Armour: Use and abuse of the best armour there is
skills.Explosives: Make things go boom without going boom yourself
skills.Tactics: Strategic thinking, setting up ambushes perhaps (or spotting where they may be set up by someone else), and other military-type training that focuses your character on the battlefield
skills.Cryptology: Encoding and decoding secrets and ciphers
skills.Engineering: Ship maintenance, repairing drones, cutting through locked doors, or designing new mechanical parts
skills.Forgery: Making stuff look like stuff it isn’t. Like signatures.
skills.History: What happened before you were there to see it and why
skills.Research: Finding information in databases, scientific journals, data centres, etc
skills.Natural Sciences: Biology, botany, zoology; study of organic creatures and how they work, flora, and fauna
skills.Navigation: Figure out the best way to get where you’re going
skills.Sensors: Interpreting a whole heap of scan data to find anomalies or things of interest
skills.Systems Interface: Your ability to operate and interact with digital control systems—whether on a starship bridge, station terminal, outpost console, or emergency override panel. Systems Interface governs real-time manipulation of user-facing systems like power reroutes, system lockdowns, navigational tools, environmental controls, and automated safety features.
